metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13735 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
There is a floating point exception in the kodak_radc_load_raw function in dcraw_common.cpp in LibRaw 0.18.2. It will lead to a remote denial of service attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-13735` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.5-1
libraw20 - 0.18.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dcraw package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
exactimage package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
libraw package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.5-1').
rawtherapee package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
